trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_SEQ_00<tab>The maidservant P'ebaloh comes to you for assistance, for her own fighting days are long past.
TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_SEQ_01<tab>A mysterious monstrosity has been spotted on the beach. Proceed to the spot and slay three of the pugils that seem to flock to it.
TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_SEQ_02<tab>A ripening carcass has been drawing the pugils to the area. Haul away the monster banquet, and all shall be well.
TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_SEQ_03<tab>You have hauled the carcass away. Report to P'ebaloh, and try to stay downwind of her.
TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_SEQ_04<tab>You speak to P'ebaloh and discover that groundskeepers have only recently tidied the beach. Dangerous visitors clearly grow more commonplace.

TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_PEBALOH_000_000<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>, a word if I may. A visiting danseuse spotted strange fish on the beach and came screaming back to the house. She is a level-headed young person, so I fear 'tis no vapors.
TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_PEBALOH_000_001<tab>The beach is no place for any frolics until the truth is ascertained. I turn to you once again. May we trouble you to check the beach?

TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_PEBALOH_000_030<tab>Pugils, on the beaches of Costa del Sol! We live in strange times. The carcass must have drifted ashore, for it seems to have been dead longer than a day or two, and that is when the beach was last tidied by the keepers.

TEXT_GAIUSB312_00853_PEBALOH_000_031<tab>Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>. You need not stay downwind─I have smelled that smell before. We must step up the groundskeeping, I fear. Master Gegeruju is likely to have one of his ideas otherwise.
